message.content:
cs.CV, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.GR 

This paper deals with image-based camera relocalization, which is a problem in computer vision and robotics. The paper proposes a new angle-based reprojection loss for training a convolutional neural network to regress for pixels in a query image their corresponding 3D world coordinates in the scene. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category for this paper is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). 

Additionally, the paper also involves optimization schemes and machine learning techniques, which are relevant to sub-categories such as cs.RO (Robotics), cs.LG (Machine Learning), and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). 

Finally, the paper also mentions the use of multi-view constraints, which are related to sub-category cs.GR (Graphics).
